Q: How do you get this info?

Boot Windows 7, launch the N-trig control panel and read the firmware version from its main page.

In Maverick (10.10), firmware version is printed on driver load:

[   22.808279] ntrig 0003:1B96:0001.0001: hidraw0: USB HID v1.10 Device [N-trig DuoSense] on usb-0000:00:14.5-2/input0

[   22.811262] ntrig 0003:1B96:0001.0001: Firmware version: 4.6.5.8.5 (1808 05a1)
